name: Molly Ruben-Long
bio: Molly Ruben-Long is a comedian and actress based in New Orleans, LA. Her stand-up has been featured on Sirius XM Radio and Flophouse, a new show on the Viceland network. She can also be seen in Hidden America with Jonah Ray, premiering January 2016 on NBCâ€™s online comedy network, SeeSo. She has performed comedy in venues across the United States on the Girls with Mace Comedy Tour and is one half of the sketch comedy duo Raw Honey. Her festival appearances include Hell Yes Fest in New Orleans, Fun Fun Fun Fest in Austin and Crom Comedy Festival in Denver.
